reviews.text: Best train station for me . Easy access,  toilets always clean and open early,  great helpful staff,  clean , trains always on time . For me it's the best station in central London.
Amazingly helpful security, managed to retrieve a lost phone at 3.00AM when the station was closed. If only other station’s staff were as helpful

I'm leaving this review after several bad journeys from here!  Don't get a train from here if you're in a rush. The timings on the internet and the timings on the train board don't marry up and the staff are a joke and have no idea which train goes where. 

It's difficult to know who to trust. I have got trains from here which the internet have said go to the right place and the cannon Street boards don't. And then got trains the staff said will go to a place and don't! Just cut out the rubbish and go to a main station, like London bridge. At least they know what's going on there!
In the toilets at this station, there are Dyson Airblade hand dryers.
Free toilets. That doesn't happen very often in central London. And a good train service.
